ET.description: Research and development of a part is required

SE.description: Knowledge about automotive and computational systems is required

KoIC.description: Knowledge of the vehicles control's is required

WoO.description: Physical access to the vehicle is required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to control the vehicle through the installation of non-OEM parts in the vehicle

ET.description: Cellular systems typically follow standardized protocols with known exploits, but additional research time may be required for the specific implementation

SE.description: Knowledge of cellular communication systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls may be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to control the cellular communication input/output to and from the vehicle PUF 10: HITRUST Threat Catalogue (2022) HITRUST Alliance. Available at: https://hitrustalliance.net/hitrust-threat-catalogue/ (Accessed: 30 October 2023).

ET.description: Internet protocols and their exploits are documented, but the specific implementation may require additional research

SE.description: Knowledge of traditional internet networking is required

KoIC.description: some knowledge about the vehicle's controls may be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to control the internet communication to and from the vehicle

ET.description: Channel protocols and exploits are generally well documented

SE.description: Knowledge about communication channels and networking is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls may be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest information sent to the receive only communication channel

ET.description: Short range wireless protocols are well documented; including their weaknesses and potential exploits

SE.description: Knowledge about automotive systems and short range protocols are required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls may be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: an attack designed to collect and harvest sensitive information stored within the vehicle through the user of short range wireless communication protocols

ET.description: Research into the specific implementation of well documented cryptography standards is required. Then additional time must be spent to obtain the key

SE.description: Knowledge of automotive, computational, and cryptographic systems is required

KoIC.description: Detailed knowledge about the vehicle's control systems is required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest and control the cryptographic protocols used within a vehicle
